name: Dragon Crashers (Cozmo.gg)
description:
Unity has just released a new gorgeous sample project, Dragon Crashers! These samples are always excellent to see how Unity themselves use their tools, this one is all about 2D. So you can see tons of 2D Tools in action like Sprite Shape, Tile map, 2D Bone Skeleton, 2D IK, PSD Importer, and tons more

I just Made a EXE out of this AMAZING RPG SAMPLE GAME BY UNITY. 

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdNBvrfgFhmZZuLCefXC0KQ

Discord - https://discord.com/invite/y435tJg2JB
